description:
Human Resources Administrator ($85k)
A global financial services firm based in West Los Angeles is seeking a poised and professional Human Resources Administrator to join their dynamic HR department.
The Human Resources Administrator will be responsible for handling a wide-range of HR tasks, including process administration, employee data management, and ad-hoc projects.
Daily duties will include:
  • Acting as a primary point of contact for the HR department, providing white-glove service to employees and new-hires.
  • Handling all HR data and transaction processing, including managing employee data, maintaining payroll change notices, etc.
  • Assisting with onboarding and offboarding, including creating all documents, drafting communications, and preparing materials.
  • Drafting offer letters and handling correspondence with candidates.
  • Serving as the primary point of contact for the HRIS system, including pulling reports, maintaining data integrity, and answering questions regarding the system.
  • Acting as the primary point of contact for Payroll – answering employee and new hire questions regarding payroll actions.
  • Running background checks, processing I-9s, and reviewing progress reports.

Candidates must have 4+ years of administrative/operations experience within an HR department, preferably within finance or a corporate environment. The individual in this role must also be detail-oriented, organized, and have working knowledge of an HRIS system and Microsoft Office Suite.
Perks include:
  • A competitive base salary, up to $85k (DOE)
  • Paid overtime
  • A hybrid work schedule
  • Strong benefits and PTO package

Please apply today if qualified and interested!
